rows.label: qev025101_MSG0001
rows.name: Dammit! Am I too late?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0002
rows.name: ...You there! Did you see her jump, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0003
rows.name: Er, would you mind answering a few questions for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to help if you can.

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0021
rows.name: Stay out of it.

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's appreciated, you know? Always good to meet
a friendly person on something like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0005
rows.name:
What? Hey, no no no! You're an eyewitness, right?
I can't just let you wander off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Sorry, but I need you to cooperate, all right?
And, uh, maybe don't scowl at me like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0007
rows.name:
So my name's Ackwar, you see?
Believe it or not, I'm the very first Ma-non BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0008
rows.name:
As a Mediator, it's my job to go around the city
resolving trouble, okay? Especially when it involves
other Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0009
rows.name:
So first off, your name is...[ST:playername ],
yes? Yes. I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Let me ask this nicely, [ST:playername ]...
Are you the murderer? You are, aren't you? Er, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0030
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0031
rows.name: Fiercely deny Ackwar's insulting accusation.

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask why Ackwar is looking for a murderer
when the victim jumped.

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Great! Oh, that's good, yeah? I had a good feeling
about you from the beginning. ...Plus a serial murderer
probably wouldn't hang around the scene, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Hmm? You want to know how this counts as a
murder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Interesting. And judging from your calm tone,
I think you're probably totally innocent.
I know it makes no sense, but, uh, there it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0014
rows.name:
So there's been a string of strange Ma-non killings
lately, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0015
rows.name:
That's why I'm guessing this "jumping" incident here
was actually some foul foul play, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0016
rows.name:
Take it from meâ€”if a Ma-non wanted to end their own
life, they simply wouldn't have the conviction or self-
assurance to see it through, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0017
rows.name:
But even if they DID, they certainly wouldn't go jumping
off some crazy tall building, you know? That's crazy.
Too too crazy for Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod as if that makes sense.

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0060
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask why Ackwar would possibly think that.

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Right? So there must still be a terrible criminal behind
this, don't you think? A criminal who may even
continue to yearn for Ma-non blood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0019
rows.name:
We Ma-non are logical and thoughtful, yes? If we
wanted to end it all, we'd probably invent a new
euthanasia device. No pain. No fear. Efficient, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Jumping is emotional and so so irrational, no?
It's not the Ma-non way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0021
rows.name:
So there must still be a terrible criminal behind this,
don't you think? A criminal who may even continue
to yearn for Ma-non blood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0022
rows.name:
You are a BLADE too, yes? Would you maybe help me
on this investigation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0023
rows.name:
You'll be rewarded very very well, most likely.
...So, er, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Oh, good! Jim told me to ask another BLADE if I ever
needed help, and it seems he was correct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0025
rows.name:
I would ask you to start with questioning, okay?
I have a specific human I want you to consult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0070
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask what Ackwar is going to do in the meantime.

rows.label: qev025101_JNK0080
rows.name: Get Down to Business

rows.label: qev025101_SEL0081
rows.name: Learn who Ackwar wants you to interview.

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Er, well, I'll be investigating the scene.
The culprit must have left some trace behind, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I want you to go to a ridiculously delicious
business called Army Pizza, okay? So good.
So so so good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0028
rows.name:
If I remember correctly, the owner is named Powell?
He was close to Duduma, who is the...the victim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ask about her past, okay? Maybe what she liked?
Whatever you can learn about her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0030
rows.name:
There is a ridiculously delicious business in the
commercial district called Army Pizza, isn't there?
So good. So so so good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0031
rows.name:
If I remember correctly, the owner is named Powell?
He was close to Duduma, who is the...the victim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ask about her past, okay? Maybe what she liked?
Whatever you can learn about her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0033
rows.name:
I'll be investigating the scene in the meantime.
The culprit must have left some trace behind, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Thanks, and good luck! I'm sure we'll crack this case
together, don't you think?[ST:wait ]
